amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the St. Joseph's College Theatre.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the St. Joseph's College Theater.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 328 (Roll no. 560).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 328 (Roll no. 560).
